  1. WHEELING NEWS

  1. Chicago Executive Airport Expansion Statement - Wheeling Village Board

    The Wheeling Village Wheeling Board has released a statement regarding runway expansion at Chicago Executive Airport. Read on...

  2. Adoption of 2018 International Building Codes - effective 3/1/2019.

    Click here for additional Info...

  3. New Laws for Illinois Drivers

    Please be aware of these new laws taking effect in 2019. Read on...

  4. Close Before You Doze - A Fire Safety Initiative

    When a fire ignites, there's no time to act. Take these fire safety and prevention steps today and you'll sleep easier at night. Read on...

  5. Wheeling Village Board Approves Redevelopment Agreement for Uptown 500

    On Monday, May 21, the Board of Trustees approved a Redevelopment Agreement (RDA) with Uptown 500, LLC to build a new mixed-use development in Wheeling’s rapidly growing town center area. Read on...

  6. AquaHawk Alerting is Here !

    AquaHawk Alerting is a free service for Village of Wheeling water customers. Register now and begin monitoring and managing your water usage. Read on...

  7. Wheeling Town Center

    Progress is under way on the Wheeling Town Center. Read on...

  8. Before You Fly Your Drone

    Flying a drone near an airport is highly discouraged and dangerous. Read on...

  9. ComEd Smart Meters

    Information on ComEd smart meters is available now. Read on...

  10. 2018 State of the Village Address

    President Patrick Horcher delivered the 2018 State of the Village Address on 3-14-2018 Additional Info...

  11. Wheeling Board Approves Strategic Plan

    The Village Board approved a strategic plan for the calendar years 2015-2016 Read on...

  1. IN THE SPOTLIGHT
    Stay up to date with what's happening in the Wheeling Community




  1. Flying Drones Near Airport
    Flying drones near airports is highly discouraged and is dangerous. Hobbyists who want to operate drones within 5 miles of an airport, must contact the airport operator and the airport control tower before they fly.
    Drone Warning Flyer (PDF)
    Read More


  1. Chicago Executive Airport
    Chicago Executive Airport is a low-cost/no delay alternative to O'Hare International for business travelers and for the shipping of airfreight. The Chicago Executive Airport is co-owned by and co-located in the Village of Wheeling and the City of Prospect Heights.
    Read More


  1. Wheeling Town Center
    Progress is underway for the Wheeling Town Center. 

    Wheeling Town Center Live Webcam

    Intersection Improvements
